newsitem.title: USA: Sonat sets payment for Transocean shares.
newsitem.headline: Sonat sets payment for Transocean shares.

text.p: Sonat Offshore Drilling Inc said Wednesday it had determined the pro rata amounts of cash and company common stock to be paid to Transocean ASA shareholders who did not elect cash in Sonat Offshore Drilling's offer for Transocean shares.

Such shareholders will receive $3.43 in cash plus 0.4633 of a Sonat Offshore share for each share of Transocean ASA. As previously announced, shareholders who elected cash will be paid $27.25 per Transocean share.

Sonat Offshore Drilling further stated that, pursuant to the requirements of Norwegian law, it would commence in the near future a Mandatory Bid to acquire all remaining Transocean shares not owned by it at a price of $28.74 per share in cash. -- New York Newsdesk 212-859-1610.
